Category.Name: DeviceControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for device information and control.
Category.Description: Category for device information and control.

StringReg.Name: DeviceVendorName
StringReg.ToolTip: This feature provides the name of the manufacturer of the device.
StringReg.Description: This feature provides the name of the manufacturer of the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceModelName
StringReg.ToolTip: This feature provides the model of the device.
StringReg.Description: This feature provides the model of the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceManufacturerInfo
StringReg.ToolTip: This feature provides extended manufacturer information about the device.
StringReg.Description: This feature provides extended manufacturer information about the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceVersion
StringReg.ToolTip: This feature provides the version of the device.
StringReg.Description: This feature provides the version of the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceFirmwareVersion
StringReg.ToolTip: Version of the firmware in the device.
StringReg.Description: Version of the firmware in the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceSerialNumber
StringReg.ToolTip: This feature provides serial number of the device.
StringReg.Description: This feature provides serial number of the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceUserID
StringReg.ToolTip: This feature provides user defined name of the device.
StringReg.Description: This feature provides user defined name of the device.

Command.Name: DeviceReset
Command.ToolTip: This command is used to reset the device and to put it in its power up state. This will reset both the CXP Engine and the camera head.
Command.Description: This command is used to reset the device and to put it in its power up state. This will reset both the CXP Engine and the camera head.

Command.Name: CameraHeadReset
Command.ToolTip: This command resets the camera's circuitry. The CXP Engine doesn't reset. NOTE: After the camera has been reset, the user should issue a UserSetLoad command.
Command.Description: This command resets the camera's circuitry. The CXP Engine doesn't reset. NOTE: After the camera has been reset, the user should issue a UserSetLoad command.

Integer.Name: DeviceSFNCVersionMajor
Integer.ToolTip: Major version of the Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device's GenICam XML.
Integer.Description: Major version of the Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device's GenICam XML.

Integer.Name: DeviceSFNCVersionMinor
Integer.ToolTip: Minor version of the Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device's GenICam XML.
Integer.Description: Minor version of the Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device's GenICam XML.

Integer.Name: DeviceSFNCVersionSubMinor
Integer.ToolTip: Sub minor version of Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device's GenICam XML.
Integer.Description: Sub minor version of Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device's GenICam XML.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceScanType
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature specifies the scan type of the sensor.
Enumeration.Description: This feature specifies the scan type of the sensor.

Float.Name: SensorTemperature
Float.ToolTip: This feature returns the current sensor temperature.
Float.Description: This feature returns the current sensor temperature.

Float.Name: SensorBoardTemperature
Float.ToolTip: This feature returns the current sensor board temperature.
Float.Description: This feature returns the current sensor board temperature.

Float.Name: FPGATemperature
Float.ToolTip: This feature returns the current FPGA temperature.
Float.Description: This feature returns the current FPGA temperature

Float.Name: FPGABoardTemperature
Float.ToolTip: This feature returns the current FPGA board temperature.
Float.Description: This feature returns the current FPGA board temperature.

Category.Name: TemperatureControl
Category.ToolTip: Category contains camera temperature control settings, including fan
Category.Description: Category contains camera temperature control settings, including fan

Enumeration.Name: FanMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature sets the operation mode of the camera fan.
Enumeration.Description: This feature sets the operation mode the camera fan.

Float.Name: FanOnTemperature
Float.ToolTip: This feature sets the temperature in Celsius degrees, when camera fan will be switched ON to cool the camera.
Float.Description: This feature sets the temperature in Celsius degrees, when camera fan will be switched ON to cool the camera.

Enumeration.Name: SensorType
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature returns the CMOS sensor type.
Enumeration.Description: This feature returns the CMOS sensor type.

Enumeration.Name: SensorModel
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature returns the CMOS model name.
Enumeration.Description: This feature returns the CMOS smodel name.

Integer.Name: RgsID
Integer.ToolTip: This feature returns the RGS ID register.
Integer.Description: This feature returns the RGS ID register.

Integer.Name: FirmwareImage
Integer.ToolTip: This feature returns the Firmware Image ID ( F=Factory or A=Application ).
Integer.Description: This feature returns the Firmware Image ID ( F=Factory or A=Application ).

Integer.Name: CameraHeadFirmwareVersion
Integer.ToolTip: This feature returns the CameraHead Firmware version number.
Integer.Description: This feature returns the CameraHead Firmware version number.

Integer.Name: CameraHeadFirmwareBuild
Integer.ToolTip: This feature returns the CameraHead Firmware build number.
Integer.Description: This feature returns the CameraHead Firmware build number.

Integer.Name: CustomerID
Integer.ToolTip: This feature returns the Customer ID for custom firmware ( 0=Imperx standard firmware ).
Integer.Description: This feature returns the Customer ID for custom firmware ( 0=Imperx standard firmware ).

Integer.Name: FamilyID
Integer.ToolTip: This feature returns the Family ID.
Integer.Description: This feature returns the Family ID.

Integer.Name: GetCustomerID
Integer.ToolTip: This feature reads the CustomerID register.
Integer.Description: This feature reads the CustomerID register.

Integer.Name: GetFirmwareVersion
Integer.ToolTip: This feature reads the Firmware version register.
Integer.Description: This feature reads the Firmware version register.

Integer.Name: XmlVersion
Integer.ToolTip: This feature returns the version of the XML file.
Integer.Description: This feature returns the version of the XML file.

Category.Name: CxpSupport
Category.ToolTip: Category, that includes registers, needed to support other standards, such as GenICam.
Category.Description: Category, that includes registers, needed to support other standards, such as GenICam.

Integer.Name: Standard
Integer.ToolTip: Returns CoaXPress "magic" number.
Integer.Description: Returns CoaXPress "magic" number.

Integer.Name: Revision
Integer.ToolTip: Returns revision of the CoaXPress specification implemented in this device.
Integer.Description: Returns revision of the CoaXPress specification implemented in this device.

Integer.Name: XmlManifestSize
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the number of XML manifests available in this device.
Integer.Description: Returns the number of XML manifests available in this device.

Integer.Name: XmlManifestSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the number of the selected XML manifest.
Integer.Description: Returns the number of the selected XML manifest.

Integer.Name: XmlSchemaVersion
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the GenICam schema version for the XML.
Integer.Description: Returns the GenICam schema version for the XML.

Integer.Name: XmlUrlAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the address of the start of the URL string which points to the XML file.
Integer.Description: Returns the address of the start of the URL string which points to the XML file.

Integer.Name: IidcPointer
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the address of the start of the IIDC register space.
Integer.Description: Returns the address of the start of the IIDC register space.

Category.Name: ImageFormatControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for Image Format Control features.
Category.Description: Category for Image Format Control features.

Integer.Name: SensorWidth
Integer.ToolTip: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.

Integer.Name: SensorHeight
Integer.ToolTip: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.

Integer.Name: WidthMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum width of the image (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Maximum width of the image (in pixels) for OffsetX=0. The dimension is calculated after horizontal binning, decimation or any other function changing the horizontal dimension of the image.

Integer.Name: HeightMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum height of the image (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Maximum height of the image (in pixels) for OffsetY=0. This dimension is calculated after vertical binning, decimation or any other function changing the vertical dimension of the image

Integer.Name: Width
Integer.ToolTip: This feature represents the actual image width expelled by the camera of the master AOI (in pixels).
Integer.Description: This feature represents the actual image width expelled by the camera of the master AOI (in pixels).

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.ToolTip: This feature represents the actual image height expelled by the camera of the master AOI (in pixels).
Integer.Description: This feature represents the actual image height expelled by the camera of the master AOI (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Horizontal offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Vertical offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature indicates the format of the pixel to use during the acquisition.
Enumeration.Description: This feature indicates the format of the pixel to use during the acquisition.

Enumeration.Name: PixelSize
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature indicates the total size in bits of a pixel of the image.
Enumeration.Description: This feature indicates the total size in bits of a pixel of the image.

Enumeration.Name: PixelColorFilter
Enumeration.ToolTip: Type of color filter that is applied to the image.
Enumeration.Description: Type of color filter that is applied to the image.

EnumEntry.Name: None
EnumEntry.ToolTip: No color filter.
EnumEntry.Description: No color filter.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerRG
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Bayer Red Green filter.
EnumEntry.Description: Bayer Red Green filter.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGB
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Bayer Green Blue filter.
EnumEntry.Description: Bayer Green Blue filter.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGR
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Bayer Green Red filter.
EnumEntry.Description: Bayer Green Red filter.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerBG
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Bayer Blue Green filter.
EnumEntry.Description: Bayer Blue Green filter.

Integer.Name: DecimationVertical
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical sub-sampling of the image.
Integer.Description: Vertical sub-sampling of the image. This reduces the vertical resolution (height) of the image by the specified vertical decimation factor.

Boolean.Name: ReverseX
Boolean.ToolTip: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device.
Boolean.Description: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device. The Region of interest is applied after the flipping. On the color camera, PixelFormat should be changed accordingly current ReverseX and ReverseY set

Boolean.Name: ReverseY
Boolean.ToolTip: Flip vertically the image sent by the device.
Boolean.Description: Flip vertically the image sent by the device. The Region of interest is applied after the flipping. On the color camera, PixelFormat should be changed accordingly current ReverseX and ReverseY set

Enumeration.Name: TestPattern
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of test pattern that is generated by the device as image source.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of test pattern that is generated by the device as image source.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is coming from the sensor.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is coming from the sensor.

EnumEntry.Name: GreyHorizontalRamp
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled horizontally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled horizontally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest.

EnumEntry.Name: GreyVerticalRamp
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled vertically with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled vertically with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest.

EnumEntry.Name: GreyHorizontalRampMoving
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled horizontally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest and that moves horizontally from left to right at each frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled horizontally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest and that moves horizontally from left to right at each frame.

EnumEntry.Name: GreyVerticalRampMoving
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled vertically with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest and that moves verticaly from top to bottom at each frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled vertically with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest and that moves verticaly from top to bottom at each frame.

EnumEntry.Name: FlatField
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Displays a Flat Field.
EnumEntry.Description: Displays a Flat Field.

Enumeration.Name: SensorTestPattern
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of test pattern that is generated by the device as image source.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of test pattern that is generated by the device as image source.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is coming from the sensor.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is coming from the sensor.

EnumEntry.Name: Mode0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sensor test image mode #0
EnumEntry.Description: Sensor test image mode #0

Enumeration.Name: AdcBitDepth
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which ADC bit depth to use
Enumeration.Description: Selects which ADC bit depth to use. A higher ADC bit depth results in better image quality but slower maximum frame rate.

Enumeration.Name: SensorShutterMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the shutter mode of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the shutter mode of the device.

EnumEntry.Name: Rolling
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The shutter opens and closes sequentially for groups (typically lines) of pixels.
EnumEntry.Description: The shutter opens and closes sequentially for groups (typically lines) of pixels. All the pixels are exposed for the same length of time but not at the same time.

EnumEntry.Name: Global
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The shutter opens and closes at the same time for all pixels.
EnumEntry.Description: The shutter opens and closes at the same time for all pixels. All the pixels are exposed for the same length of time at the same time.

EnumEntry.Name: GlobalReset
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The shutter opens at the same time for all pixels but ends in a sequential manner.
EnumEntry.Description: The shutter opens at the same time for all pixels but ends in a sequential manner. The pixels are exposed for different lengths of time.

Category.Name: AcquisitionControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for the acquisition and trigger control features.
Category.Description: Category for the acquisition and trigger control features.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the acquisition mode of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the acquisition mode of the device. It defines mainly the number of frames to capture during an acquisition and the way the acquisition stops.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Frames are captured continuously until stopped with the AcquisitionStop command.
EnumEntry.Description: Frames are captured continuously until stopped with the AcquisitionStop command.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.ToolTip: This feature starts the Acquisition of the device.
Command.Description: This feature starts the Acquisition of the device.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.ToolTip: This feature stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame.
Command.Description: This feature stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disables the Exposure and let the shutter open.
EnumEntry.Description: Disables the Exposure and let the shutter open.

EnumEntry.Name: Timed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Timed exposure.
EnumEntry.Description: Timed exposure. The exposure duration time is set using the ExposureTime or ExposureAuto features and the exposure starts with the FrameStart or LineStart.

EnumEntry.Name: TriggerWidth
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Uses the width of the current Frame or Line trigger signal(s) pulse to control the exposure duration.
EnumEntry.Description: Uses the width of the current Frame or Line trigger signal(s) pulse to control the exposure duration. Note that if the Frame or Line TriggerActivation is RisingEdge or LevelHigh, the exposure duration will be the time the trigger stays High. If TriggerActivation is FallingEdge or LevelLow, the exposure time will last as long as the trigger stays Low.

Float.Name: ExposureTime
Float.ToolTip: Sets the Exposure time in microseconds when ExposureMode is Timed and ExposureAuto is Off
Float.Description: Sets the Exposure time in microseconds when ExposureMode is Timed and ExposureAuto is Off

Enumeration.Name: ExposureAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the automatic exposure mode when ExposureMode is Timed.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the automatic exposure mode when ExposureMode is Timed. The exact algorithm used to implement this control is device-specific.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure duration is user controlled using ExposureTime.
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure duration is user controlled using ExposureTime.

EnumEntry.Name: Once
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure duration is adapted once by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure duration is adapted once by the device. Once it has converged, it returns to the Off state.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure duration is constantly adapted by the device to maximize the dynamic range.
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure duration is constantly adapted by the device to maximize the dynamic range.

Boolean.Name: AcquisitionFrameRateEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls if the AcquisitionFrameRate and AcquisitionFramePeriod features are writable and used to control the acquisition rate.
Boolean.Description: Controls if the AcquisitionFrameRate and AcquisitionFramePeriod features are writable and used to control the acquisition rate. If this mode is ON, user can extend the actual frame time beyond the free-running frame time.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionFrameTime
Integer.ToolTip: This feature sets the actual frame time in microseconds.
Integer.Description: This feature sets the actual frame time in microseconds.

Float.Name: AcquisitionFrameRate
Float.ToolTip: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.
Float.Description: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.

Boolean.Name: AcquisitionLineTimeEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls if the AcquisitionLineTime feature are writable and used to control the acquisition line time.
Boolean.Description: Controls if the AcquisitionLineTime feature are writable and used to control the acquisition line time.

Float.Name: AcquisitionLineTime
Float.ToolTip: This feature sets the actual line time in pixel clocks.
Float.Description: This feature sets the actual line time in pixel clocks.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionBurstFrameCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of frames to acquire for each FrameBurstStart trigger.
Integer.Description: Number of frames to acquire for each FrameBurstStart trigger.

Integer.Name: CurrentExposureTime
Integer.ToolTip: This feature returns the current exposure time in microseconds.
Integer.Description: This feature returns the current exposure time in microseconds.

Integer.Name: CurrentFrameTime
Integer.ToolTip: This feature returns the current frame time in microseconds.
Integer.Description: This feature returns the current frame time in microseconds.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: This features enables the Trigger mode of operation.
Enumeration.Description: This features enables the Trigger mode of operation.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disables the selected trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Disables the selected trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enable the selected trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Enable the selected trigger.

Command.Name: TriggerSoftware
Command.ToolTip: Generates an internal trigger.
Command.Description: Generates an internal trigger. TriggerSource must be set to Software.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source. The selected trigger must have its TriggerMode set to On.

EnumEntry.Name: Line1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the Hardware Input Line GP IN 1 ( TRIGGER 1 ) will be used as external source for the trigger signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the Hardware Input Line GP IN 1 ( TRIGGER 1) will be used as external source for the trigger signal.

EnumEntry.Name: Line2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the Hardware Input Line GP IN 2 ( TRIGGER 2 ) will be used as external source for the trigger signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the Hardware Input Line GP IN 2 ( TRIGGER 2 ) will be used as external source for the trigger signal

EnumEntry.Name: LinkTrigger
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the CXP Link Trigger will be used as source for the trigger signal (received from the CXP transport layer).
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the CXP Link Trigger will be used as source for the trigger signal (received from the CXP transport layer).

EnumEntry.Name: PulseGenerator
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger source will be generated by camera's internal Pulse Generator.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger source will be generated by camera's internal Pulse Generator.

EnumEntry.Name: Software
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger source will be generated by software using the TriggerSoftware command.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger source will be generated by software using the TriggerSoftware command.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: RisingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the rising edge of the source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the rising edge of the source signal.

EnumEntry.Name: FallingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling edge of the source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling edge of the source signal.

Integer.Name: TriggerDebounceTime
Integer.ToolTip: This feature specifies the debounce period of the trigger signal.
Integer.Description: This feature specifies the debounce period of the trigger signal.

Integer.Name: TriggerFilterTime
Integer.ToolTip: This feature specifies the Filter time in microseconds. Any pulse shorter than the selected time is ignored
Integer.Description: This feature specifies the Filter time in microseconds. Any pulse shorter than the selected time is ignored

Enumeration.Name: TriggerOverlap
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the trigger overlap mode, if the camera receives a trigger pulse while the camera is still processing the previous trigger.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the trigger overlap mode, if the camera receives a trigger pulse while the camera is still processing the previous trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: No trigger overlap is permitted.
EnumEntry.Description: No trigger overlap is permitted. Camera will ignore the next trigger

EnumEntry.Name: ReadOut
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Trigger is accepted immediately after the exposure period.
EnumEntry.Description: Trigger is accepted immediately after the exposure period.

Integer.Name: TriggerDelay
Integer.ToolTip: This feature specifies the delay time in units of microseconds between the trigger pulse and start of exposure
Integer.Description: This feature specifies the delay time in units of microseconds between the trigger pulse and start of exposure.

Category.Name: AnalogControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Analog control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Analog control features.

Float.Name: Gain
Float.ToolTip: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value.
Float.Description: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value. This is an amplification factor applied to the video signal.

Enumeration.Name: GainAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the automatic gain control (AGC) mode.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the automatic gain control (AGC) mode. The exact algorithm used to implement AGC is device-specific.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain is User controlled using Gain.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain is User controlled using Gain.

EnumEntry.Name: Once
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain is automatically adjusted once by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain is automatically adjusted once by the device. Once it has converged, it automatically returns to the Off state.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain is constantly adjusted by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain is constantly adjusted by the device.

Float.Name: BlackLevel
Float.ToolTip: Controls the on-sensor analog black level as an absolute physical value.
Float.Description: Controls the on-sensor analog black level as an absolute physical value. This represents a DC offset applied to the video signal.

Enumeration.Name: BlackLevelAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the on-sensor mode for automatic black level adjustment.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the on-sensor mode for automatic black level adjustment.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Analog black level is user controlled using BlackLevel.
EnumEntry.Description: Analog black level is user controlled using BlackLevel.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Analog black level is constantly adjusted by the sensor.
EnumEntry.Description: Analog black level is constantly adjusted by the sensor.

Boolean.Name: SensorBlackLevelRecomended
Boolean.ToolTip: Use recomended value of BlackLevel from the sensor
Boolean.Description: Use recomended value of BlackLevel from the sensor

Float.Name: Gamma
Float.ToolTip: Controls the gamma correction of pixel intensity.
Float.Description: Controls the gamma correction of pixel intensity. This is typically used to compensate for non-linearity of the display system (such as CRT).

Float.Name: DigitalGain
Float.ToolTip: This features controls the Digital Gain for all taps.
Float.Description: This features controls the Digital Gain for all taps.

Float.Name: DigitalBlackLevel
Float.ToolTip: This feature controls the Digital Black Level for all taps.
Float.Description: This feature controls the Digital Black Level for all taps.

Enumeration.Name: BalanceRatioSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Balance ratio to control.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Balance ratio to control.

EnumEntry.Name: Red
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Balance Ratio will be applied to the red channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Balance Ratio will be applied to the red channel.

EnumEntry.Name: Blue
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Balance Ratio will be applied to the blue channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Balance Ratio will be applied to the blue channel.

Float.Name: BalanceRatio
Float.ToolTip: Controls ratio of the selected color component to a reference color component.
Float.Description: Controls ratio of the selected color component to a reference color component. It is used for white balancing.

Enumeration.Name: BalanceWhiteAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the mode for automatic white balancing between the color channels.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the mode for automatic white balancing between the color channels. The white balancing ratios are automatically adjusted.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: White balancing is user controlled using BalanceRatioSelector and BalanceRatio.
EnumEntry.Description: White balancing is user controlled using BalanceRatioSelector and BalanceRatio.

EnumEntry.Name: Once
EnumEntry.ToolTip: White balancing is automatically adjusted once by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: White balancing is automatically adjusted once by the device. Once it has converged, it automatically returns to the Off state.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: White balancing is constantly adjusted by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: White balancing is constantly adjusted by the device.

Category.Name: AutoAlgorithmControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains all auto algorithm related features.
Category.Description: Category that contains all auto algorithm related features.

Float.Name: BalanceWhiteAutoLowerLimit
Float.ToolTip: Controls the minimum value Auto White Balance can set for the Red/Blue BalanceRatio.
Float.Description: Controls the minimum value Auto White Balance can set for the Red/Blue BalanceRatio.

Float.Name: BalanceWhiteAutoUpperLimit
Float.ToolTip: Controls the maximum value Auto White Balance can set for the Red/Blue BalanceRatio.
Float.Description: Controls the maximum value Auto White Balance can set for the Red/Blue BalanceRatio.

Integer.Name: BalanceWhiteAutoSpeed
Integer.ToolTip: Speed of auto white algorithm.
Integer.Description: Speed of auto white algorithm.

Float.Name: ExposureAutoLowerLimit
Float.ToolTip: The smallest exposure time that auto exposure can set.
Float.Description: The smallest exposure time that auto exposure can set.

Float.Name: ExposureAutoUpperLimit
Float.ToolTip: The largest exposure time that auto exposure can set.
Float.Description: The largest exposure time that auto exposure can set.

Float.Name: DigitalGainAutoLowerLimit
Float.ToolTip: The smallest digital gain that auto gain can set.
Float.Description: The smallest digital gain that auto gain can set.

Float.Name: DigitalGainAutoUpperLimit
Float.ToolTip: The largest digital gain that auto gain can set.
Float.Description: The largest digital gain that auto gain can set.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureGainAutoPriority
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects whether to adjust gain or exposure first.
Enumeration.Description: Selects whether to adjust gain or exposure first.

EnumEntry.Name: Gain
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain Priority Mode
EnumEntry.Description: Gain Priority Mode

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureTime
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure Time Priority
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure Time Priority

Enumeration.Name: ExposureGainAutoMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature sets the luminance mode to be used during AGC or AEC.
Enumeration.Description: This feature sets the luminance mode to be used during AGC or AEC.

Integer.Name: ExposureGainAutoTarget
Integer.ToolTip: This feature sets the desired luminance level to be maintained during AGC or AEC.
Integer.Description: This feature sets the desired luminance level to be maintained during AGC or AEC.

Integer.Name: ExposureGainAutoTargetThreshold
Integer.ToolTip: This feature sets the acceptable steady-state error of the luminance level to be maintained during AGC or AEC.
Integer.Description: This feature sets the acceptable steady-state error of the luminance level to be maintained during AGC or AEC.

Category.Name: ExposureAutoPIDCoefficients
Category.ToolTip: Category that controls the PID coefficients for Exposure Auto control loop.
Category.Description: Category that controls the PID coefficients for Exposure Auto control loop.

Float.Name: ExposureAutoPMin
Float.ToolTip: This features controls the minimum of the P coefficient for Exposure Auto control loop.
Float.Description: This features controls the minimum of the P coefficient for Exposure Auto control loop.

Float.Name: ExposureAutoPMax
Float.ToolTip: This features controls the maximum of the P coefficient for Exposure Auto control loop.
Float.Description: This features controls the maximum of the P coefficient for Exposure Auto control loop.

Float.Name: ExposureAutoExposureForPMax
Float.ToolTip: This features maps the maximum of the P coefficient to the value of exposure in the Exposure Auto control loop.
Float.Description: This features maps the maximum of the P coefficient to the value of exposure in the Exposure Auto control loop.

Category.Name: GainAutoPIDCoefficients
Category.ToolTip: Category that controls the PID coefficients for Gain Auto control loop.
Category.Description: Category that controls the PID coefficients for Gain Auto control loop.

Float.Name: GainAutoPcoef
Float.ToolTip: This features controls the P coefficient for Gain Auto control loop.
Float.Description: This features controls the P coefficient for Gain Auto control loop.

Float.Name: GainAutoIcoef
Float.ToolTip: This features controls the I coefficient for Gain Auto control loop.
Float.Description: This features controls the I coefficient for Gain Auto control loop.

Float.Name: GainAutoDcoef
Float.ToolTip: This features controls the D coefficient for Gain Auto control loop.
Float.Description: This features controls the D coefficient for Gain Auto control loop.

Integer.Name: AverageLuminosity
Integer.ToolTip: Shows Average Luminosity of the image.
Integer.Description: Shows Average Luminosity of the image.

Integer.Name: CurrentFrameCounterLow
Integer.ToolTip: Shows number of frames captured since the camera power up (low part).
Integer.Description: Shows number of frames captured since the camera power up (low part).

Integer.Name: CurrentFrameCounterHigh
Integer.ToolTip: Shows number of frames captured since the camera power up (high part).
Integer.Description: Shows number of frames captured since the camera power up (high part).

Enumeration.Name: LUTEnable
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature activates the selected LUT.
Enumeration.Description: This feature activates the selected LUT.

Enumeration.Name: FFCEnable
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature activates the selected FFC.
Enumeration.Description: This feature activates the selected FFC.

Enumeration.Name: DefectPixelCorrection
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature enables Defect Pixel Correction.
Enumeration.Description: This feature enables Defect Pixel Correction.

Enumeration.Name: DefectPixelCorrectionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the method used for replacing defective pixels.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the method used for replacing defective pixels.

EnumEntry.Name: Average
EnumEntry.Description: Pixels are replaced with the average of their neighbours.

EnumEntry.Name: Highlight
EnumEntry.Description: Pixels are replaced with the maximum pixel value.

EnumEntry.Name: Zero
EnumEntry.Description: Pixels are replaced by the value zero.

Enumeration.Name: BadPixelCorrection
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature enables Bad Pixel Correction.
Enumeration.Description: This feature enables Bad Pixel Correction.

Enumeration.Name: BadPixelCorrectionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the method used for replacing Bad pixels.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the method used for replacing Bad pixels.

EnumEntry.Name: Average
EnumEntry.Description: Pixels are replaced with the average of their neighbours.

EnumEntry.Name: Highlight
EnumEntry.Description: Pixels are replaced with the maximum pixel value.

EnumEntry.Name: Zero
EnumEntry.Description: Pixels are replaced by the value zero.

Enumeration.Name: DefectClusterCorrection
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature enables Defect Cluster Correction.
Enumeration.Description: This feature enables Defect Cluster Correction.

Enumeration.Name: DefectClusterCorrectionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the method used for replacing defective pixels.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the method used for replacing defective pixels.

EnumEntry.Name: Average
EnumEntry.Description: Pixels are replaced with the average of their neighbours.

EnumEntry.Name: Highlight
EnumEntry.Description: Pixels are replaced with the maximum pixel value.

EnumEntry.Name: Zero
EnumEntry.Description: Pixels are replaced by the value zero.

Integer.Name: DefectPixelCountMax
Integer.ToolTip: This feature represents the maximum number of pixels in the Defect Pixel Correction Table.
Integer.Description: This feature represents the maximum number of pixels in the Defect Pixel Correction Table.

Integer.Name: BadPixelCountMax
Integer.ToolTip: This feature represents the maximum number of pixels in the Bad Pixel Correction Table.
Integer.Description: This feature represents the maximum number of pixels in the Bad Pixel Correction Table.

Integer.Name: DefectClusterCountMax
Integer.ToolTip: This feature represents the maximum number of pixels in the Defect Cluster Correction Table.
Integer.Description: This feature represents the maximum number of pixels in the Defect Cluster Correction Table.

Category.Name: DigitalIOControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the digital input and output control features, including Trigger and Strobe.
Category.Description: Category that contains the digital input and output control features, including Trigger and Strobe.

Enumeration.Name: LineSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the physical line (or pin) of the external device connector or the virtual line of the Transport Layer to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the physical line (or pin) of the external device connector or the virtual line of the Transport Layer to configure.

EnumEntry.Name: Input1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the Hardware Input Line IN 1 ( TRIGGER 1 ) and associated I/O control block to use.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the Hardware Input Line IN 1 ( TRIGGER 1 ) and associated I/O control block to use.

EnumEntry.Name: Input2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the Hardware Input Line 2 ( TRIGGER 2 ) and associated I/O control block to use.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the Hardware Input Line 2 ( TRIGGER 2 ) and associated I/O control block to use.

EnumEntry.Name: Output1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the Hardware Output Line OUT 1 ( STROBE 1 ) and associated I/O control block to use.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the Hardware Output Line OUT 1 ( STROBE 1 ) and associated I/O control block to use.

EnumEntry.Name: Output2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the Hardware Output Line OUT 2 ( STROBE 2 ) and associated I/O control block to use.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the Hardware Output Line OUT 2 ( STROBE 2 ) and associated I/O control block to use.

Enumeration.Name: LineMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the physical Line is used to Input or Output a signal.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the physical Line is used to Input or Output a signal.

EnumEntry.Name: Input
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The selected physical line is used to Input an electrical signal.
EnumEntry.Description: The selected physical line is used to Input an electrical signal.

EnumEntry.Name: Output
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The selected physical line is used to Output an electrical signal.
EnumEntry.Description: The selected physical line is used to Output an electrical signal.

Boolean.Name: LineInverter
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls the inversion of the signal of the selected input or output Line.
Boolean.Description: Controls the inversion of the signal of the selected input or output Line.

Boolean.Name: LineStatus
Boolean.ToolTip: Returns the current status of the selected input or output Line.
Boolean.Description: Returns the current status of the selected input or output Line.

Enumeration.Name: LineSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which internal acquisition or I/O source signal to output on the selected Line.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which internal acquisition or I/O source signal to output on the selected Line. LineMode must be Output.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Line output is disabled (Tri-State).
EnumEntry.Description: Line output is disabled (Tri-State).

Enumeration.Name: LineFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the current electrical format of the selected physical input or output Line.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the current electrical format of the selected physical input or output Line.

EnumEntry.Name: NoConnect
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The Line is not connected.
EnumEntry.Description: The Line is not connected.

EnumEntry.Name: TriState
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The Line is currently in Tri-State mode (Not driven).
EnumEntry.Description: The Line is currently in Tri-State mode (Not driven).

EnumEntry.Name: TTL
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The Line is currently accepting or sending TTL level signals.
EnumEntry.Description: The Line is currently accepting or sending TTL level signals.

EnumEntry.Name: OptoCoupled
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The Line is opto-coupled.
EnumEntry.Description: The Line is opto-coupled.

Enumeration.Name: Strobe1Reference
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature sets the reference event for Strobe #1 signal.
Enumeration.Description: This feature sets the reference event for Strobe #1 signal

Enumeration.Name: Strobe1Enable
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature allows to Enable or Disable the Strobe #1
Enumeration.Description: This feature allows to Enable or Disable the Strobe #1

Integer.Name: Strobe1Width
Integer.ToolTip: This feature sets the pulse duration for the Strobe1 in units of uSeconds.
Integer.Description: This feature sets the pulse duration for Strobe1 in units of uSeconds.

Integer.Name: Strobe1Delay
Integer.ToolTip: This feature sets the delay from the reference for Strobe1 in units of uSeconds.
Integer.Description: This feature sets the delay from the reference for Strobe1 in units of uSeconds.

Enumeration.Name: Strobe2Reference
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature sets the reference event for Strobe #2 signal.
Enumeration.Description: This feature sets the reference event for Strobe #2 signal

Enumeration.Name: Strobe2Enable
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature allows to Enable or Disable the Strobe #2
Enumeration.Description: This feature allows to Enable or Disable the Strobe #2

Integer.Name: Strobe2Width
Integer.ToolTip: This feature sets the pulse duration for the Strobe2 in units of uSeconds.
Integer.Description: This feature sets the pulse duration for the Strobe2 in units of uSeconds.

Integer.Name: Strobe2Delay
Integer.ToolTip: This feature sets the delay from the reference for Strobe2 in units of uSeconds.
Integer.Description: This feature sets the delay from the reference for Strobe2 in units of uSeconds.

Enumeration.Name: PulseGenGranularity
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature sets the multiplication factor of the Pulse Generator where x1 = 1uS, x10=10uS, etc.
Enumeration.Description: This feature sets the multiplication factor of the Pulse Generator where x1 = 1uS, x10=10uS, etc.

Integer.Name: PulseGenWidth
Integer.ToolTip: This feature sets the pulse width of the Pulse Generator in microseconds.
Integer.Description: This feature sets the pulse width of the Pulse Generator in microseconds.

Integer.Name: PulseGenPeriod
Integer.ToolTip: This feature sets the pulse period of the Pulse Generator in microseconds
Integer.Description: This feature sets the pulse period of the Pulse Generator in microseconds

Integer.Name: PulseGenNumPulses
Integer.ToolTip: This feature sets the number of pulses to be generated by the Pulse Generator
Integer.Description: This feature sets the number of pulses to be generated by the Pulse Generatore

Enumeration.Name: PulseGenMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature sets the mode of the Pulse Generator.
Enumeration.Description: This feature sets the mode of the Pulse Generator.

Boolean.Name: PulseGenEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: This feature enables the Pulse Generator. The pulse generator output can be mapped to the OUT1 or OUT2 output signals.
Boolean.Description: This feature enables the Pulse Generator. The pulse generator output can be mapped to the OUT1 or OUT2 output signals.

Category.Name: CanonLensControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains Canon Lens Control features
Category.Description: Category that contains Canon Lens Control features

Category.Name: ControllerSettings
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains Canon Lens Controller settings features
Category.Description: Category that contains Canon Lens Controller settings features

Command.Name: InitLens
Command.ToolTip: This command initializes the Canon Lens, if one mounted to the camera
Command.Description: This command initializes the Canon Lens, if one mounted to the camera

Command.Name: StopLens
Command.ToolTip: Removes the power from the Iris drive. Run InitLens command to resume the lens control
Command.Description: Removes the power from the Iris drive. Run InitLens command to resume the lens control

Enumeration.Name: LensControllerStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature shows the status of Canon Lens initialization
Enumeration.Description: This feature shows the status of Canon Lens initialization.

Enumeration.Name: LensAF_MF
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature shows the status of Auto/Manual focus switch located at the lens
Enumeration.Description: This feature shows the status of Auto/Manual focus switch located at the lens

Enumeration.Name: LensPresenceCheck
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature enables or disables the check of lens presence
Enumeration.Description: This feature enables or disables the check of lens presence

Enumeration.Name: LensClockPolarity
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature sets the polarity of the Lens Clock
Enumeration.Description: This feature sets the polarity of the Lens Clock

Command.Name: GetLensStatus
Command.ToolTip: Requests the value of Lens Status register
Command.Description: Requests the value of Lens Status register

Integer.Name: LensStatus
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the status of the Lens after the GetLensStatus run
Integer.Description: Returns the status of the Lens after the GetLensStatus run

Command.Name: GetLensID
Command.ToolTip: Requests the value of Lens ID register
Command.Description: Requests the value of Lens ID register

Integer.Name: LensID
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the ID register value of the Lens after the GetLensID run
Integer.Description: Returns the ID register value of the Lens after the GetLensID run

Command.Name: NearFull
Command.ToolTip: Drives the focus to the fully Near position
Command.Description: Drives the focus to the fully Near position

Command.Name: FarFull
Command.ToolTip: Drives the focus to the fully Far position
Command.Description: Drives the focus to the fully Far position

Integer.Name: FocusStepValue
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the focus step to be moved with NearStep and FarStep commands
Integer.Description: Sets the focus step to be moved with NearStep and FarStep commands

Command.Name: FarStep
Command.ToolTip: Drives the focus to the Far direction by the amount defined in the FocusStepValue feature
Command.Description: Drives the focus to the Far direction by the amount defined in the FocusStepValue feature

Command.Name: NearStep
Command.ToolTip: Drives the focus to the Near direction by the amount defined in the FocusStepValue feature
Command.Description: Drives the focus to the Near direction by the amount defined in the FocusStepValue feature

Command.Name: SetFocusPosition
Command.ToolTip: Drives the focus to the absolute position defined in the FocusReqPosition feature
Command.Description: Drives the focus to the absolute position defined in the FocusReqPosition feature

Integer.Name: FocusReqPosition
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the desired focus value to use with SetFocusPosition command
Integer.Description: Sets the desired focus value to use with SetFocusPosition command

Integer.Name: FocusMax
Integer.ToolTip: Returns Maximum focus encoder value
Integer.Description: Returns Maximum focus encoder value

Command.Name: FocusSetMax
Command.ToolTip: Sets the maximum focus encoder value by copying current encoder value
Command.Description: Sets the maximum focus encoder value by copying current encoder value

Command.Name: GetFocusEncoderStatus
Command.ToolTip: Requests the focus encoder position value
Command.Description: Requests the focus encoder position value

Integer.Name: FocusEncoderStatus
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the current focus encoder value after the GetFocusEncoderStatus command issued
Integer.Description: Returns the current focus encoder value after the GetFocusEncoderStatus command issued

Command.Name: ResetFocusEncoder
Command.ToolTip: Resets the Focus encoder
Command.Description: Resets the Focus encoder

Integer.Name: IrisRequestedPositionRaw
Integer.ToolTip: Sets raw iris absolute position.
Integer.Description: Sets raw iris absolute position.

Command.Name: SetIrisPosition
Command.ToolTip: Drives the iris to the absolute position value of IrisRequestedPositionRaw
Command.Description: Sets the iris to the absolute position value of IrisRequestedPositionRaw

Command.Name: OpenIrisFull
Command.ToolTip: Opens the iris to the fully opened position
Command.Description: Opens the iris to the fully opened position

Command.Name: CloseIrisStep
Command.ToolTip: Closes the iris by the amount defined in the IrisStepValue feature
Command.Description: Closes the iris by the amount defined in the IrisStepValue feature

Command.Name: OpenIrisStep
Command.ToolTip: Opens the iris by the amount defined in the IrisStepValue feature
Command.Description: Opens the iris by the amount defined in the IrisStepValue feature

Integer.Name: IrisStepValue
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the iris step to be moved with OpenStep and CloseStep commands
Integer.Description: Sets the iris step to be moved with OpenStep and CloseStep commands

Float.Name: CurrentFNumber
Float.ToolTip: Returns the current f-number value of the lens iris. Value of 0.0 signals about unknown iris position
Float.Description: Returns the current f-number value of the lens iris. Value of 0.0 signals about unknown iris position

Command.Name: GetIrisRange
Command.ToolTip: Sends the "Get Iris Range" command to the camera
Command.Description: Sends the "Get Iris Range" command to the camera

Integer.Name: IrisMin
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the minimum iris limit
Integer.Description: Returns the minimum iris limit

Integer.Name: IrisMin2
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the minimum2 iris limit
Integer.Description: Returns the minimum2 iris limit

Integer.Name: IrisMin1
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the minimum1 iris limit
Integer.Description: Returns the minimum1 iris limit

Integer.Name: IrisMax
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the maximum iris limit
Integer.Description: Returns the maximum iris limit

Integer.Name: IrisRange
Integer.ToolTip: Displays the Limit values of the iris, after the GetIrisRange command issued
Integer.Description: Displays the Limit values of the iris, after the GetIrisRange command issued

Category.Name: TransportLayerControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the transport Layer control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the transport Layer control features.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceTapGeometry
Enumeration.ToolTip: This device tap geometry feature describes the geometrical properties characterizing the taps of a camera as presented at the output of the device.
Enumeration.Description: This device tap geometry feature describes the geometrical properties characterizing the taps of a camera as presented at the output of the device.

Command.Name: ConnectionReset
Command.ToolTip: Activates the Link Reset procedure.
Command.Description: Activates the Link Reset procedure.

Enumeration.Name: CxpLinkConfigurationPreferred
Enumeration.ToolTip: Provides the Link configuration that allows the Transmitter Device to operate in its default mode.
Enumeration.Description: Provides the Link configuration that allows the Transmitter Device to operate in its default mode.

EnumEntry.Name: CXP2_X4

Enumeration.Name: CxpLinkConfiguration
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature allows specifying the Link configuration for the communication between the Receiver and Transmitter Device.
Enumeration.Description: This feature allows specifying the Link configuration for the communication between the Receiver and Transmitter Device. In most cases this feature does not need to be written because automatic discovery will set configuration correctly to the value returned by CxpLinkConfigurationPreferred. Note that the currently active configuration of the Link can be read using CxpLinkConfigurationStatus.

Integer.Name: DeviceConnectionID
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the ID of the device link.
Integer.Description: Returns the ID of the device link.

Integer.Name: MasterHostConnectionID
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the Host link ID connected to this device's master link.
Integer.Description: Returns the Host link ID connected to this device's master link.

Integer.Name: ControlPacketSizeMax
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the maximum control packet data size that the device can accept.
Integer.Description: Returns the maximum control packet data size that the device can accept.

Integer.Name: StreamPacketSizeMax
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the maximum stream packet data size that the host can accept.
Integer.Description: Returns the maximum stream packet data size that the host can accept.

Integer.Name: Image1StreamID
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the STREAM ID for the primary image stream from the device.
Integer.Description: Returns the STREAM ID for the primary image stream from the device.

Boolean.Name: TestMode
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the device to send CXP link test packets to the host.
Boolean.Description: Enables the device to send CXP link test packets to the host.

Integer.Name: TestErrorCount
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the current error count for a Host to Device link test. Writing a 0x0 clears the error counter.
Integer.Description: Returns the current error count for a Host to Device link test. Writing a 0x0 clears the error counter.

Integer.Name: TestPacketCountTx
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the current transmitted connection test packet count. Writing a 0x0 clears the packet counter.
Integer.Description: Returns the current transmitted connection test packet count. Writing a 0x0 clears the packet counter.

Integer.Name: TestPacketCountRx
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the current received connection test packet count. Writing a 0x0 clears the packet counter.
Integer.Description: Returns the current received connection test packet count. Writing a 0x0 clears the packet counter.

Enumeration.Name: CustomCxpLinkConfiguration

EnumEntry.ToolTip: 4 Connections operating at CXP-2 speed (2.50 Gbps).
EnumEntry.Description: 4 Connections operating at CXP-2 speed (2.50 Gbps).

EnumEntry.Description: 4 Connections operating at CXP-3 speed (3.125 Gbps).

Category.Name: UserSetControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the User Set control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the User Set control features.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Select which User Set to load, save or configure.
Enumeration.Description: Select which User Set to load, save or configure.

EnumEntry.Name: Default
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the factory setting user set.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the factory setting user set.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the user set 0.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the user set 0.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the user set 1.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the user set 1.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the user set 2.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the user set 2.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the user set 3.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the user set 3.

Command.Name: UserSetLoad
Command.ToolTip: Loads the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the device and makes it active.
Command.Description: Loads the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the device and makes it active.

Command.Name: UserSetSave
Command.ToolTip: Save the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the non-volatile memory of the device.
Command.Description: Save the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the non-volatile memory of the device.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetDefault
Enumeration.ToolTip: Select which User Set to load and make active when the device is reset.
Enumeration.Description: Select which User Set to load and make active when the device is reset.

EnumEntry.Name: Default
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Select the factory setting user set.
EnumEntry.Description: Select the factory setting user set.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Select the user set 0.
EnumEntry.Description: Select the user set 0.

EnumEntry.Description: Select the user set 1.

EnumEntry.ToolTip: Select the user set 2.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet3

EnumEntry.Description: Select the user set 4.

Port.Name: Device
Port.ToolTip: Provides the default GenICam port of the Device.
Port.Description: Provides the default GenICam port of the Device.

Integer.Name: TLParamsLocked
Integer.ToolTip: Used by the Transport Layer to prevent critical features from changing during acquisition.
Integer.Description: Used by the Transport Layer to prevent critical features from changing during acquisition.

Integer.Name: DeviceStreaming
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the state of the Camera streaming interface: 1 when grabbing, 0 when not.
Integer.Description: Returns the state of the Camera streaming interface: 1 when grabbing, 0 when not.

Integer.Name: ParamsLocked
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the state of the GenTL or Camera streaming interface: 1 when grabbing, 0 when not.
Integer.Description: Returns the state of the GenTL or Camera streaming interface: 1 when grabbing, 0 when not.
